about.title: About Me
about.content: I love building modern web apps.

my-story.title: My Story
my-story.p1: I'm a passionate full-stack developer based in Algiers, with over 3 years of experience building web and mobile applications that make a difference.
my-story.p2: My journey in tech started when I built my first website at 16. What began as curiosity turned into a deep passion for creating digital experiences that solve real problems. I love the entire process - from understanding user needs to architecting scalable solutions.
my-story.p3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or sharing knowledge with the developer community. I believe in continuous learning and always staying curious about emerging trends in technology.

entries.title: Fullstack Developer
entries.description: Fullstack Developper working on refactoring and new features using ReactJS, Tailwind, and Symfony.
responsibilities: Refacto the old front code built with twig and bootstrap to ReactJS and Tailwind.
Developed new features using React and Tailwind.
Collaborated with backend team for API integration.
Developed new dashboard statistics features using Symfony

entries.title: Mid Software Engineer / Backend Developer
entries.description: Backend Developer focusing on building reusable services with Laravel.
responsibilities: Built reusable backend services using Laravel.
Implemented REST APIs and integrated with frontend.
Developed and optimized APIs for CRM, ATS, and SRM systems.

entries.title: Fullstack Developer
entries.description: Fullstack developer focusing on projects from scratch using Vue.js and Laravel.
responsibilities: Create User Inerface using Vue.js and Tailwind.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and design new features.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Deploy applications and provide ongoing maintenance and support.
projects: Portal of system ans security industrial including inverntory management

entries.description: Focused on full-stack development and systems.

entries.title: Goodswap
entries.description: Plateforme de charité (don & échange d'objets & espace pour les organisations carritatives) réaliser avec (MongoDB & ExpressJS & React JS &  React Native  & NodeJS) en appliquant (SCRUM & MVC) .
entries.longDescription: This project is my personal portfolio where I present my work, skills, and experiences. It was built with React and Tailwind CSS for a clean, responsive UI and deployed for easy access.
